Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Fulton/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Fulton/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Fulton/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Kedzie, Bryn Mawr, California, and Foster, due to, street blockage near Foster/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Kedzie, Bryn Mawr, California, and Foster, due to, street blockage near Foster/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
